alert.note: Alert for Lunenburg; Prince Edward (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 10:02PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Mecklenburg, southwestern Prince Edward and western Lunenburg Counties through 1045 PM EDT... At 1001 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cullen, or near Charlotte Court House, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chase City, Rehoboth, Kells Corner, Darlington Heights, Wilburn, Briery, Loves Mill, Arvins Store, Finneywood, Fairview, Plantersville, Blevins Corner, Pleasant Grove, Fort Mitchell, Simplicity and Gary. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
